body.name: Wireless Retro Game Console, Nostalgia Stick Game, Plug & Play Video TV Game Stick with 10000+ Games Built-in, 64G, Nostalgiastick Game Console, 4K HDMI Output, Dual 2.4G Wireless Controllers
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs 17 mins
features: 🎮🎮【10000+ Classic Games】No need to download or pay for additional games. Enjoy endless hours of fun with pre-loaded classic games.
🎮🎮【4K HDMI Output】Experience high-quality graphics and smooth gameplay with 4K HDMI output. Equipped with upgraded chip for powerful operation ability.
🎮🎮【Dual Wireless Controllers】Play with a friend or family member with the included dual wireless controllers. Stable connection with almost zero latency and a maximum connection distance of 32.8 ft.
🎮🎮【Wide Compatibility】Suitable for 4K ultra-high-definition TV/computer/monitor/projector with HDMI input port. Perfect for your graphical quality and game fluency needs.
🎮🎮【Satisfaction Guaranteed】If you're not satisfied with our wireless retro game console, we offer a replacement or refund. Our customer service team is always ready to help.

🎮🎮【Please noted】The game handle is divided into the main handle and vice handle, the vice handle can no longer be operated on the main page; red light for the main handle, green light for the vice handle.And 2 wireless controllers need to install 4 AAA batteries, not included in package.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.1 3.1 out of 5 stars 37 ratings 3.1 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for nostalgic games, compact design
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to play some games i play at my childhood. This gaming stick boasts a wide array of emulators and an extensive game library. The search feature is highly practical, along with the ability to mark favorites. It comes bundled with two controllers and is exceptionally user-friendly. Immersing oneself in these games truly evokes a sense of nostalgia, harkening back to the 90s or even the 80s. It includes classics like Super Mario, Donkey Kong, Contra, and even some relatively "recent" titles too. There's an abundance of fighting games and numerous imported titles. The convenience of its portability is something I particularly appreciate. great experience

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was very excited when I bought this product. It was easy to install and start playing. It has all the retro games that I loved and wanted to play. The product worked for two days and then suddenly stopped. There was a loading message then 'no signal'. I reset my television to see if that would work but hasn't. Don't waste your money or time. It isn't worth the effort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Seemed simple enough, loved the classic games. Absolutely no instructions on how to use this after it is plugged in. Once I accidentally got to the list of games, all I saw were unfamiliar names of games that are very similar to the classic games. After scrolling through several pages (they are alphabetical) looking for Pacman, I found several versions of Pacland nut no Pacman. That's when I unplugged things and put it back in the box.If you're looking for simple cheap games, this is it.If you're looking for the real classics, keep looking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars if you like retro
reviews.reviewText: all the games that were fashionable in the 80s and 90s where you paid to play on a machine are in one piece... I like to have games in all versions of the same game... even versions that didn't come out in America. ... to install it it is the same as a Roku behind your television (it comes with an extension cable in case it is difficult to charge it) you have to connect it to the power and the television... it comes with a microSD where all the games are. ... remember that the quality of the games is like the originals..... the best day wireless controls

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars looked easy but, would not work
reviews.reviewText: Being disabled, I wanted something to help pass time. Easy hook up, just plug and play. But, it would not do anything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works very well
reviews.reviewText: If you like classic games then this is the ideal equipment, easy to use and requires no installation. This has a lot of games something pretty cool for me at least
